page.title: 11 CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: We have a{Youth Club}for boys and girls between 11 and 18. Sometimes there is a disco with loud music. When there isn't a disco there is pool, darts and games. It is quite a lot of fun. There are outings to Rollerworld in Derby and other places. When I'm 11 I will be going to Youth Club. You can start{Cubs}when you are eight. We leave when we are eleven.The cubs play rounders and football. In the winter we go sledging. We work for badges. There are 18 cubs in 3 sixes. We meet on Thursdays in the village hall. { Trinity Folk}are a music group that play and sing mainly in the Parish Church but at other times as well. We sang at the P.T.A. Cheese and Wine Party. Mr. Addison plays his guitar.
